00015 Point::Point( const int *ind, int attr ) : Element(Geometry::POINT) {
00016    attribute = attr;

00020 void Point::GetVertices( Array<int> &v ) const {
00021    v.SetSize( 1 );
00022    v[0] = indices[0];
